thread.title: Voldemort Is Haunting Emma Watson In This "Beauty And The Beast" Trailer Mashup

author: Mat Whitehead
title: Voldemort Is Haunting Emma Watson In This "Beauty And The Beast" Trailer Mashup
text:
View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10580306 3. …Lord friccin’ Voldemort! View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10580307 4. A lot of characters merge into mashups between their Disney origins and the world of Harry Potter. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10580309 5. And it’s seriously amazing how well it works together. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10580311 6. Also the whole love story is even more messed up when you think about it. View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10580312 7. But TBH I would watch the SHIT out of this movie if it were real. View this image ›
youtube.com I’ll just have to settle for the regular old Beauty and the Beast I guess…
ID: 10580313
Mat Whitehead is a staff writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
